com.bergerkiller.bukkit.common.controller

Class PlayerDataController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bergerkiller.bukkit.common.controller.PlayerDataController

  • public class PlayerDataController
extends java.lang.Object
    A controller for dealing with player data loading and saving. To hook it up to the server, call assign().

    • Constructor Summary

      PlayerDataController()

      Called when the entity data for a human entity has to be loaded By default, this method redirects to the underlying implementation.

      Called when the entity data of a human entity has to be saved.
